data.title: Mad Honey Band — Peacetown
data.text:
Allen Sudduth: electric, acoustic and slide guitars (studio and) performing with Norton Buffalo, Commander Cody, DFFH, Amos Garrett, Roy Rogers and other So.Co. bands.

Gailene Elliott: Guitar and vocals in Sonoma County (solo and) bands including: The Mix, I World International Rockers, Jimmy Dillon Band, The New Copasetics and featured (in studio) on hundreds of other artists musicians projects since 1980. Residing in New Orleans, Gailene was invited by 2 of their most sacred brothers, George Porter Jr and Art Neville (formerly of The Meters) embraced Gailene in their side band Runnin’ Pardners. Now featuring her own new band, Mad Honey.

Vic Carberry: Drums, percussion, vocals. Played and recorded with Tommy Tutone, Sam and Allegra Broughton Band and others.

Gailene’s husby, Jay Elliott: bassist, has played in the John Bright Band with Paul Robinson, with Gailene in their duo and trios.

THIS IS MAD HONEY!
